text: 17.12 Sng 41.9, 109.8, Jon 6.39, 13.18, 18.9, Apo 1.20, Hib 2.13, 1 Jo 2.19 Nad bɨawl yɨb awl mɨdeban tek, yɨp age abe mɨdebin agak. Anɨb ak tek, ñɨn ak yad kɨli ayɨp nep mɨdɨl, kɨlop kod mɨdtep yesɨpin agak. Kod mɨdtep gen, olap ma kul gup agak. Bɨ ne kul gep tek anep, buk Baybol gɨnɨgab agɨl tɨkɨlak tek nep kul gɨnɨgab agak.
